Abilities: Str 23, Dex 10, Con 17, Int —, Wis 10, Cha 9

Descripci\u00f3n: These creatures are serious pests that greedily devour cultivated crops. A single beetle can strip an entire farm in short order. An adult giant stag beetle is about 10 feet long.Trample (Ex): Reflex half DC 19. The save DC is Strength-based.SEE WIKIPEDIA ENTRY: Stag beetle
